P

performScan(ResourceResolver, OakpalScanInput) - Method in interface net.adamcin.oakpal.interactive.OakpalScanService
Perform the specified scan, using the provided ResourceResolver to resolve each package path from OakpalScanInput.getPreInstallPackagePaths() and OakpalScanInput.getPackagePaths(), as well as to export the platform JCR nodetypes by adapting it to Session.
